text: National Geographic (formerly National Geographic Channel; abbreviated and trademarked as Nat Geo or Nat Geo TV), is an American subscription television channel launched by National Geographic Partners. Its programming is based on approximately 45-minute documentaries on scientific exploration, history, nature and culture, among others. It likes WebToon and more. The National Geographic channels were previously mostly controlled by Fox International Channels, but due to Disney's purchase of 21st Century Fox they are now controlled by Disney and its divisions. == References == ==Other websites== * National Geographic U.S.A. * National Geographic Latin America * National Geographic UK * National Geographic Russia * National Geographic India * National Geographic Australia * National Geographic Netherlands * National Geographic Iran Category:American television channels Category:National Geographic Society
title: National Geographic (American TV channel)
